Grammar:    DataElement 5.1
Namespace:  shr.test
Uses:       shr.core // This shouldn't be needed, but due to bug in importer, it is!

CodeSystem:     FOO = http://foo.org

EntryElement:   SpecialParent
Value:          0..1 string

EntryElement:   SpecialChild
Based on:        SpecialParent
1..1 _Value
0..0 _Entry.Version
